channel.title: Need help w/ downloading!
channel.description:
EDIT: I THINK THIS IS THE WRONG PLACE
I need help with firstly downloading and starting moparscape...so i look at the main post where "moparisthebest" posted the link to download moparscape 3.2 ( or was it just 3? ) and i clicked this, it gave me 2 download options (http://uppit.com/NCD3S and http://www.ihud.com/file.php?file=files/180307/1174257375/MoparScapeInstall.exe ) Firsty, i "IHud" one doesnt work...it doesnt have any link to moparscape, and the download from " Uppit" downloads sucsesfully, and then when it has been sucsesfully downloaded and installed, i double click it on my desktop and it appears the way its ment to be ( i have saw my freind using it )...but that only lasts for a second or two, then it closes. I have downloaded it 3 or 4 times now and i am just fraustrated now.
Does anyone have a sollution to my problem?

item.title: Need help w/ downloading!
item.dc:creator: @Jaketuricchi Jaketuricchi
